list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the part projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the nostrils and used for breathing and smelling.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he slowly breathed out the air through his nose
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh từ từ thở ra khỏi mũi qua mũi anh.

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the front end of an aircraft, car, or other vehicle.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the plane's nose dipped as it started descending toward the runway
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Mũi của máy bay nhúng khi nó bắt đầu từ đường băng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a look, especially out of curiosity.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she wanted a good nose around the house
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy muốn có một cái mũi tốt quanh nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of an animal) thrust its nose against or into something, especially in order to smell it.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the pony nosed at the straw
I was anxious to get inside and nose around her house
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã lo lắng để có được bên trong và mũi quanh nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a vehicle or its driver) make one's way cautiously forward.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he turned left and nosed into an empty parking space
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh rẽ trái và mũi vào một chỗ đậu xe trống
